title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Land Development Agency
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Land Development Agency 

Act 2021 (Valuation of Relevant Public Land) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 10 March 2023. 

Definition

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(a) of the Principal
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(a) of the Principal 
Act. 

Regulation 3 

Tailte Éireann shall nominate a person to determine the market value of the 
land. 

Part 2 

Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(b) of the Principal 
Act. 

Regulation 4 

The person nominated by Tailte Éireann to determine the market value of the 
land shall be – 

(a) 

a qualified valuer with experience in valuing development land 
assets of a similar scale and nature, and 

(b) 

a member of one or more of the following: 

(i) 

the Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland (SCSI); 

(ii) 

the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS); 

(iii) 

the Institute of Professional Auctioneers and Valuers 
(IPAV); 

(iv) such equivalent or successor bodies to one of the bodies 

mentioned in clauses (i) to (iii). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Part 3 

[106] 5 

Regulation 5 

Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(c) of the Principal 
Act.
text_norm: schedule part 1 matter prescribed purpose section 55(5)(a) principal act regulation 3 tailte eireann shall nominate person determine market value land part 2 matter prescribed purpose section 55(5)(b) principal act regulation 4 person nominated tailte eireann determine market value land shall - (a) qualified valuer experience valuing development land asset similar scale nature (b) member one following (i) society chartered surveyor ireland (scsi) (ii) royal institution chartered surveyor (rics) (iii) institute professional auctioneer valuer (ipav) (iv) equivalent successor body one body mentioned clause (i) (iii) part 3 106 5 regulation 5 matter prescribed purpose section 55(5)(c) principal act

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: As soon as practicable after the giving of a notice by the Land
text_raw:
1. 
As soon as practicable after the giving of a notice by the Land 
Development Agency under section 53(4), 54(3) or 55(2) of the Principal Act, 
and not later than six months after the date of the giving of that notice, other 
than where the relevant public body has agreed in writing to a later date, that 
agency shall request Tailte Éireann to carry out a valuation of the relevant 
public land.
text_norm: 1 soon practicable giving notice land development agency section 53(4) 54(3) 55(2) principal act later six month date giving notice relevant public body agreed writing later date agency shall request tailte eireann carry valuation relevant public land

heading: The request of the Land Development Agency referred to in paragraph
text_raw:
2. 
The request of the Land Development Agency referred to in paragraph 
1 shall include contact details for the relevant public body’s nominated contact 
person or persons.

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Tailte Éireann shall nominate an appropriately experienced and
text_raw:
3.

qualified valuer, in accordance with Part 2, to make the determination of value.

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Subject to paragraph 5, Tailte Éireann shall draft, and determine, the
text_raw:
4. 
Subject to paragraph 5, Tailte Éireann shall draft, and determine, the 
terms of engagement with the Land Development Agency and the relevant 
public body not later than 15 working days after the date of the Land 
Development Agency’s request under paragraph 1.

concerned, it would not be practicable to draft, and determine, the terms of 
engagement within the 15 working days mentioned in paragraph 4, such draft, 
and determination, shall be completed not later than 30 working days after the 
date of the request mentioned in paragraph 4.

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Not later than 15 working days after the date of the provision of the
text_raw:
7. 
Not later than 15 working days after the date of the provision of the 
information under paragraph 6, the Land Development Agency shall arrange 
access to the property concerned for the valuer appointed by Tailte Éireann to 
carry out an inspection for the purposes of the valuation.

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Additional information may be requested by the valuer appointed by
text_raw:
8. 
Additional information may be requested by the valuer appointed by 
Tailte Éireann, and where requested the information shall be provided by the 
Land Development Agency to the valuer and the relevant public body not later 
than 10 working days after the date of the request. 

Tailte Éireann shall provide a valuation determined by an appropriately

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: experienced and qualified valuer to the Land Development Agency and the
text_raw:
9. 
experienced and qualified valuer to the Land Development Agency and the 
relevant public body not later than 45 working days after the later of the 
following: 

(a) 

the date of the terms of engagement; 

(b) 

the date of receipt by the valuer of any additional information 
requested under paragraph 8.

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: 10. Where appropriate, based on the complexity of the asset concerned or
text_raw:
10. Where appropriate, based on the complexity of the asset concerned or 
other extenuating circumstances, Tailte Éireann, with the written agreement of 
the Land Development Agency, may, on one occasion, extend the time 
mentioned in paragraph 9 by not more than 15 working days. 

Part 4 

Regulation 6 

Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(d) of the Principal 
Act. 

Tailte Éireann shall pay the fees and costs in relation to a valuation from within 
his or her own resources. 

Part 5 

Regulation 7 

Matters prescribed for the purposes of section 55(5)(e) of the Principal 
Act. 

Where all, or part, of the land to be valued is designated for one or both

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: of the following:
text_raw:
1. 
of the following: 

(a) 

affordable housing under Part 9 of the Principal Act; 

(b) 

social and affordable housing under Part V of the Act of 2000; 

the valuer appointed by Tailte Éireann to carry out the valuation shall value 
that land on an existing use value basis at the valuation date, within the 
meaning of section 55(3)(a) or (b) of the Principal Act, in accordance with 
section 96(6)(b) of the Act of 2000 as if the land concerned were designated for 
social and affordable housing under Part V of that Act.
text_norm: 1 following (a) affordable housing part 9 principal act (b) social affordable housing part v act 2000 valuer appointed tailte eireann carry valuation shall value land existing use value basis valuation date within meaning section 55(3)(a) (b) principal act accordance section 96(6)(b) act 2000 land concerned designated social affordable housing part v act

title: and (5) of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby
heading: Where any part of the land to be valued is not designated, based on
text_raw:
2. 
Where any part of the land to be valued is not designated, based on 
information provided by the Land Development Agency, for a use mentioned 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 in subparagraph (a) or (b) of paragraph 1, such part of the land shall be valued 
on the basis of its market value.
